content:
The proposed agenda has been published here. For the super-lazy but tentatively engaged :-), here's a screen grab of the juicy part:

image.png

Last week's minutes, with substantial discussion of the ADI project (Advance Directives Interoperability), are here.

What a rock'n'rollin' meeting today! Our Patient Corrections IG project is under full steam; attached is a PDF of the project portion of the minutes - check out the screen grabs of what they've been creating. Tentative / WIP, but stimulated LOTS of good discussion. I love it when an idea starts getting concrete!

Also as you'll see, for the patient contributed data white paper, @Jan Oldenburg made the case that to do the job right, we need to push back to the next ballot cycle. (See also announcement of the project's weekly call time in next message here)

2020-10-29-Patient-Empowerment-WG-Minutes-excerpt.pdf
